name: PiratesO'Time (Gamedev.tv gamejam)
description:
https://github.com/JakeHildy/PiratesOfTime

May 2020 Gamedev.tv submission!

A game about pirates wanting gold and cannonballs. "A,W,D" to fire cannonballs, click to move. Would have loved to work on it more but couldn't find the time! Submitting anyway :D
